DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose study evaluate compatibility Triathlon Partial Knee Replacement ( PKR ) Japanese population . It expect patient receive Triathlon PKR achieve excellent clinical result without adverse effect device fit well Japanese morphology .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient require primary unicompartmental knee replacement . 2 . Patient 20 year old 80 year old . 3 . Patient diagnose osteoarthritis , rheumatoid arthritis , traumatic arthritis avascular necrosis . 4 . Patient walk independently least 10m . 5 . Patient sign Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve , study specific inform patient consent form . 6 . Patient willing able comply postoperative schedule clinical radiographic evaluation rehabilitation . 1 . Patient require revision . 2 . Patient pregnant . 3 . Patient lateral osteoarthritis . 4 . Patient le 10째of flexion contracture great 90째of flexion . 5 . Patient ` preoperative mechanical alignment le 10째 varus 15째 valgus . 6 . Patient high tibial osteotomy , femoral osteotomy and/or joint fusion . 7 . Patient neuromuscular neurosensory deficiency would limit ability assess performance device . 8 . Patient systemic metabolic disorder lead progressive bone deterioration . 9 . Patient immunologically suppress receive steroid ( > 30 day ) excess normal physiological requirement . 10 . Patient deformity require use wedge augments . 11 . Patient active suspect latent infection knee joint . 12 . Patient inappropriate participate study judgment investigator .
